browserFiles.title: Files in this web browser
browserFiles.emptyMessage: No files stored in the browser.

deleteDialog.title: Delete file from browser
deleteDialog.confirmationText: Are you sure you want to delete the following file from this web browser? If you have the file downloaded, you can always upload it back again.

uploadDialog.title: Upload file
uploadDialog.explanation: A version of the uploaded file already exists in this application. Do you want to continue with the upload and overwrite the existing file?
